div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1058 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1951 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. Contents: 45 AE. In basement room in upper town; 13 fish-shaped AE in one ancient pit and 16 in another Olbia: 29 fish-shaped AE 14 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 4 [1], 8 [2], 10-11 [1], 13 [4], 16 [2], 22 [1], 23 [2]; pl. 10, 1 [1]) Unc.: 2 AE Disposition: Kiev Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
